question: The Ayushman Bharat Scheme has recently crossed which milestone number, in regards with beneficiaries?
explanation:
As per the recent announcement by the National Health Authority (NHA), the number of people who have benefitted under the Ayushman Bharat Scheme has crossed the one crore-mark.
The flagship health insurance programme named Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojna (AB-PMJAY) was launched on September 23, 2018 in Ranchi. The scheme which is implemented by NHA, aims to provide Rs 5 lakh secondary and tertiary care hospitalisation cover to up to 10 Crore poor and vulnerable families.
